page.title: 19ST.MARY'S- MAGDALEN LAVER
page.content: & MAGDALEN laver were worked together & in 1978 were made a united benefice. Little Laver was detached from Moreton & added to the two in 1985, the parish of Matching made the total 4. These changes enabled the sale of rectorys thereby helping to ease financial problems for the church centrally. The effect locally has been to change the role of the parish priest into a peripatetic 'master of ceremonies' subject to a diversity of demanding roles, not the least of which is trying to produce and sustain programmes of worship which cause least problems for a range of tastes from High Anglo-Catholic to Low Evangelical. Possibly the greatest pressure on the incumbent is the responsibility for maintaining an historic building on falling income.
